Test Case Description: To validate Reddit account creation functionality with valid inputs

Actual Result: The enterd data should be displayed in the "First name" field

Test Step: 2.Enter mail ID in the "Rediffmail ID" field
Expected Result: The enterd data should be displayed in the "Rediffmail ID" field
Actual Result: The enterd data should be displayed in the "Rediffmail ID" field

Test Step: 3.Enter password in the "Enter password"field
Expected Result: The enterd data should be displayed in the "Enter password" field
Actual Result: The enterd data should be displayed in the "Enter password" field

Test Step: 4.Renter password in the "Retype password"field
Expected Result: The selected data should be displayed in the "Gender" field
Actual Result: The selected data should be displayed in the "Gender" field

Test Step: 5.Select Date of Birth
Expected Result: The selected data should be displayed in the "Date of birth" field
Actual Result: The selected data should be displayed in the "Date of birth" field

Test Step: 6.Select Gender
Expected Result: The selected data should be displayed in the "Gender" field
Actual Result: The selected data should be displayed in the "Gender" field

Test Step: 7.Select Country
Expected Result: The selected data should be displayed in the "I live in" field
Actual Result: The selected data should be displayed in the "I live in" field

Test Step: 8.Select City
Expected Result: The selected data should be displayed in the "City" field
Actual Result: The selected data should be displayed in the "City" field

Test Step: 9.Enter mail ID in the "My Recovery Email ID" field
Expected Result: The enterd data should be displayed in the "My Recovery Email ID" field
Actual Result: The enterd data should be displayed in the "My Recovery Email ID" field

Test Step: 10.Enter number in the "My Mobile Number"field
Expected Result: The enterd data should be displayed in the "My Mobile Number" field
Actual Result: The enterd data should be displayed in the "My Mobile Number" field

Test Step: 11.Enter captcha in the "My Mobile Number"field
Expected Result: The enterd data should be displayed in the "Enter Captcha" field
Actual Result: The enterd data should be displayed in the "Enter Captcha" field

Test Step: 12.Click on "Create my account" button
Expected Result: The message account created successfully
Actual Result: The message account created successfully

Test Case Description: To validate Reddit account creation functionality with valid inputs
Pre-Condition: Launch brower with url "m.rediff.com" and navigate to account creation page
Test Step: 1. Enter the name in the "First name" field.
Expected Result: The entered data should be displayed in the "First name" field.
Actual Result: The entered data should be displayed in the "First name" field.

Test Step: 2.Leave the "Enter Rediffmail ID" field empty and move to the next field.
Expected Result: The error message "ID cannot be blank, please enter your desired ID" should be displayed.
Actual Result: The error message "ID cannot be blank, please enter your desired ID" should be displayed.

Test Step: 3.Enter the test step that ends with a special character
Expected Result: The error message should be "ID should not end with special characters"
Actual Result: The error message should be "ID should not end with special characters"

Test Step: 4. Enter the alphabetic, numeric and "_" in the "Enter Rediff ID" field.
Expected Result: The entered data should be displayed in the "Enter Rediff ID" field.
Actual Result: The entered data should be displayed in the "Enter Rediff ID" field.

Test Step: 5.Enter Rediffmail ID and click check availability
Expected Result: System should display "Sorry, the ID that you are looking for is taken.? and show alternative ID suggestions.
Actual Result: System should display "Sorry, the ID that you are looking for is taken.? and show alternative ID suggestions.

Test Step: 6.Click on "Create my account" button
Expected Result: The message account created successfully
Actual Result: The message account created successfully
